content.raw: That fixes the test failures to a large degree. There is still a less frequent failure after several hundred iterations when `World::BuildSceneMsg` is called in parallel with `World::RemoveModel` ([see backtrace](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/f24902f8b7bbeccf6e61)). This is less frequent, so I could make an issue for it unless you have an instantaneous idea for how to fix it quickly.
